title: Update contact information with new mobile number, email, and address

requirements.text: Update the backend getContactInfo function to return the new mobile number '+91 788 796 3508', email 'sccclasses@gmail.com', and address 'Old Jalna In Front of Devine English School (Dukhi Nagar)'

quotes: the mobile number is +91 788 796 3508 and the email is sccclasses@gmail.com address is old Jalna In Front of Devine English School (Dukhi Nagar)

acceptanceCriteria: Backend getContactInfo function returns address: 'Old Jalna In Front of Devine English School (Dukhi Nagar)'

requirements.text: Ensure the ContactSection component displays the updated contact information from the backend
acceptanceCriteria: Contact section displays the new mobile number '+91 788 796 3508'
Contact section displays the new email 'sccclasses@gmail.com'
Contact section displays the new address 'Old Jalna In Front of Devine English School (Dukhi Nagar)'

constraints: Do not change the contact form submission functionality
Maintain the existing ContactSection component structure and styling
nonGoals: Changing the contact form validation logic
Modifying the visual design of the contact section
